overview:
Tae Oh is Mojo Motors’ CTO and is responsible for delivering the most innovative and highest quality technology to Mojo Motors customers. Tae has spent that past 15 years in large-scale IT development, e-commerce solution design, and fast-growth organization management positions at Dell, Macromedia, and Register.com.

Prior to joining Mojo Motors, Tae served as senior vice president of technology at Partsearch Technologies, where he managed website and technology services for over one million customers and more than 13 million products. He also led the restructuring of the technology team and was responsible for leading the engineering, website, systems, operations, quality assurance, business analysis and project management teams.

Tae earned a B.A. from the University of Texas at Austin.
